name: Divine Intervention
description: From the Creator came we all, and to the Creator we shall return, for life is a borrowed gift born of their divine breath.
effect: Followers of Arceus may call upon 'Divine Intervention' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, guaranteeing a High Critical on their next attack. At Luminary, gain 2 uses of this boon. At High Priest(ess), you gain 3.
